name: Cartoon Roach: Fun Ninja Game
storyline: These roaches have trained in ninja villages hidden behind the Japanese mountains, fended off the Persians’ attack with shields and marched from the graveyards of Raccoon City. Battle against other powerful roaches and see how many you can smash!
summary: Gross, roaches! Cartoon Roach: Fun Ninja Game is an action arcade game for kids. Compete alongside your friends as you battle the most powerful roaches from the cartoon world, all with a tap of your finger. Battle against 10 of the most powerful cartoon roaches like Konoha Ninja Roach, Spartan Roach, Living Dead Roach and more! Make sure that you don’t smash one of the good roaches like the Medic or the game is over! Compare your scores on leaderboards and social media. How many roaches can you squash? Start playing Cartoon Roach to find out!
